amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Naval Reactor account by $2.426 million and reduces funding for Federal Salaries and Expenses by $2.5 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase the funding for the Naval Reactor account by $2,426,000 and reduce funding for the Federal Salaries and Expenses by $2,500,000 account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Langevin amendment Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Langevin amendment Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A034) offered by Mr. Langevin.
